body: @deamonZ where's this one where they admit it to him? (I know about the other ones just not this one)

Ok so do who ever read this there are like 2 other versions that add on to the story in one of them it shows that the milf is talking to the police so she keeps visiting the rapist so they don't get suspicious in the other it talks about how the girls got pregnant and the mom looked for a safe place to get abortions for all of them herself included. Now most don't understand the ending, basically what happened is that the mom doesn't want to ruin her daughter's and lovers life by having those pictures and videos posted so she continues to go with the rapists, however unlike most NTR She's doesn't like the man neither do the sisters, the rapist's drugged her with aphrodisiacs and later on their bodies felt pleasure which is natural as sex mostly=pleasure if stimulated for long enough whether she likes to or not. So she went to the police after they got proof (sperm), they sent them to jail except the guys released like 4 vids before going. The guy finds out,the girls admit,forgives them
